Keywords: Reporter , Scientist , Spider-Man Family
Real Name: Peter Parker
Special Powers
MARVEL TEAM-UP: When establishing themed teams, choose a named keyword a character on your starting force has. Spider-Man gains that keyword.
QUIPS AND THWIPS: Leadership, but succeeds on a 4-6.
MOVEMENT: Elevated

Comments
March 25, 2022
BrunoHarm
I love this spider-man. especially for Frightful Four teams where he can pick up Shape change AND Skrulls TA! The 50 Point line is good for Amazons with WW TA, and the 75 point line with Batman gets stealth to go with the combat reflexes. and any team that needs that leadership would love to have him.
January 7, 2021
GL_Alex
Leadership SP? No no no....you give him the Spider Sense "Super Senses, but succeeds on "4-6". I'm not going to have a 75 point Spidey lead my team. No willpower or Indomitable? Spider-Man is the epitome of never give up. Otherwise, this is a good dial. I'm just going to stick with my SFoS Super-Rare or Avengers TA LE
November 6, 2020
ShadowArchmage
Finally! A Spider-Man for my X-Men teams.
October 10, 2020
Winken Goodfellow
You know, the worst part about this dial is that he’s got only a bit of Super Senses. I won’t use him for a main Spidey... but he’s gonna be a good stand-in for Peter B. Parker on my Spiderverse teams. I’ve used the Baron Spidey for that up until now, but a Peter who has the experience, knows all the tricks, and gets looked to as the de facto leader, but is a bit rusty and isn’t paying close attention to the instincts as much? Yeah, I’ll take it.
August 31, 2020
WelcomeToDIE
I like the idea behind him, but I do feel that given that he's the flagship character of the set, we could have had a 100/75 split instead of the usual 75/50. That would have allowed for more points to spend on Indomitable, his new 'norm' of traited Super Senses on a 4-6 with protected Outwit, and an extra click of life to buck the norm of squishy Spiders.The figure plays just fine as a game piece, it's just too bad such a perfect Spidey trait was used on an otherwise not very "Spidey" figure.
August 26, 2020
Slade Wilson
Well, I guess with the others in this set they had to shoot for something different. Love the trait, just wish he had traited Spidey senses or at least indomitable. Still here is guest-starring Spider-Man.
August 26, 2020
Daunting Mountain
Super Leadership feels weird for Spider-Man on paper, but the mechanical effects work really well. Increasing your action total? That's for him, for tagging along. Removing an action token? He's inspiring whoever he teams up with that issue.
August 25, 2020
DatHomieSilverSurfer
...I guess it's a good dial, but this really feels nothing like spider-man aside from the trait (if only that could show up on a different dial) and also, yet ANOTHER 75 point spider-man, but at least he feels different from the other 75 point ones we just got.
